bug.author: TKassis
bug.summary: Sweep does not work on Windows
bug.description:
Weights and Biases version: 0.8.12 Python version: 3.6.7 Operating System: Windows 10
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
When I run wandb agent [sweep ID] on Windows I get: wandb: ERROR Agent is not supported on Windows Does the Windows client not support the sweep functionality?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/TKassis>@TKassis</denchmark-link> Thanks for the documentation contribution. I have a branch that supports sweeps that we're planning to push to 0.8.13 this week. You can try it with
